name: Neptunian Donut
description: It is a platformer. A hard trip to the Neptune. Beware of sharks, barrels, UFO, hard sound and hard levels!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10. Processor: 2 core 2 Gz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 35 MB available space Additional Notes: Kayboard, mouse.
